cards.6: Love, choice, commitment, relationshipüîÅ Lack of love, separation, indecision, conflict
cards.7: Travel, progress, conquest, controlüîÅ Lack of direction, lack of control, recklessness, accident
cards.8: Balance, justice, law, orderüîÅInjustice, imbalance, corruption, partiality
cards.9: Solitude, introspection, wisdom, spiritualityüîÅIsolation, loneliness, withdrawal, alienation

guide.ad: Don't know how to get them? use /kc guide
guide.text: ### **What are Kc's**Kc's are small fragments of the meteorite that sealed the Kraken's power, before it found its current host Fortuna.Because it is emotionally dependent, you can use these fragments as a bargaining chip when trading with it.**What are they for?**Fragments can be used in </store dices:1207784542677630987> to customize dice rolls, and their usefulness will be expanded in the near future.**How ‚Äã‚Äãto earn Kc's?**You can earn Kc's by [voting for the bot](https://top.gg/bot/899421595125288961), with the daily reward (</daily:1192682956398006294>), or by participating in special events, there are plans for other means in the future.
